data.message: You guys are hilarious..... ya'll would make a really excellent TV Show !!!   The inerds of rap industry.... tour bits, stage times, all this stuff is great.    Those friggin' X factor & Idol shows are done really, done ruining the music industry, done pimping undeveloped talent for TV ratings.   THIS is REAL.   Marshall ought to host his own TV show seriously for music & rap industry.   Beyond the bottom rung ropes televised.   This is awesome, cheers :)
